title: Second Amendment - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/30/19
itunes:title: Second Amendment - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/30/19
description:
George Noory and gun rights advocate Mark Walters explore his work defending the second amendment, and whether the government will try to take guns away from citizens.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
